descriptionHtml:
This character is based off of Henry Cavill referenced after several different pictures of him (mostly the Tudors.) He is an Imperial Follower, also marriageable. He is found in Solitude in the Blue Palace (where the throne is.)


REQUIRED MODS:
Apachii Sky Hair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
ENSE - (must download from files on this page...mod was originally posted on nexus but deleted)

PLEASE NOTE THAT NEW STYLE EYES (ENSE) IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE ON THE NEXUS FOR WHATEVER REASON. I HAVE INCLUDED IT ON THE FILE PAGE. PUT THE ESM FILE IN YOUR DATA FOLDER AND DRAG AND DROP THE NEWEYES FOLDER (TEXTURES) INTO THE TEXTURE FOLDER (INSIDE THE DATA FOLDER) HOPEFULLY THIS HELPS!

IN THE FUTURE I WILL HAVE A SECOND VERSION THAT WILL RUN OFF OF EYES OF BEAUTY.

RECOMMENDED MODS
Better Males: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488/

INSTALLATION:
Drag and drop the files into your Data folder. Typically, this folder is found as follows:
C://Program Files/Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim/Data

Make sure this mod is after all required mods in the load order.

**If anyone can make Henry Cavill's classic curly hairstyle, please msg me. I will update this mod with another version of him of a more accurate portrayal if you are willing to help me out. I would love love love it!** <3
author: Kaolinite77
